txt.en: Accept the surrender of any Forgeworkers or Men who offer it.
You should visit the Ud没n Foothold to check on the fate of the surrendered peoples.

While many flee before the coming Gondorian army, some small number of Ud没n's forgeworkers and Men from distant lands may take the knee and surrender themselves. These few should be afforded the mercy and respect of the Free Peoples.
While many flee before the coming Gondorian army, some small number of Ud没n's forgeworkers and Men from distant lands may take the knee and surrender themselves.
'Take me as a prisoner. Anything is better than this place!'
'The Great Eye is gone. I bow before Gondor!'

'So you are the one who sent all those poor souls our way? They have not proved themselves dishonourable thus far, and waited peacefully until they were escorted out past the Black Gates to be served justice, as is their due.\n\n'You have done right in taking their word, I think.'
